Title: Which programming language used to code ReactJS ??

Answers.Title: Javascript
Answers.Explanation: Yeah it Javascript, (or maybe Typescript if you like some types :>>)

Answers.Title: React provides state-of-the-art functionality and is an excellent choice for developers looking for an easy-to-use and highly productive JavaScript framework
Using React, you can build complex UI interactions that communicate with the server in record time with JavaScript-driven pages
